name: comparavision-integration
description: Vision Model Performance Comparison Platform - Full Stack Integration

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:database
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run start:backend

author: HackThe6ix Team
